verses.verse: Hereupon Baldad the Sauchean answered and said,
What! Is there any apology, or fear with him; who made the universe and is supreme?
For let none suppose, because robbers have a respite; that snares shall not come from him on any.
For how can a mortal be just before the Lord or any offspring of woman make himself clean?
If he setteth the moon beside him, it shineth not: and the stars are not pure in his sight.
Grant then that man is rottenness and that the son of man is a worm.
